sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Apple ( AAPL ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 3.9%.
Year to date, Apple registers a 3.8% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Travelers Companies ( TRV ), trading down 1.6%.
Travelers Companies is lower by about 4.9% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are UnitedHealth Group ( UNH ), trading down 1.2%, and Home Depot ( HD ), trading up 0.5% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
